message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about air pollution and its effect on star visibility. In the city, there are more factories and human activities that release pollutants into the air. These pollutants can include smoke, smog, and particulate matter, which can dirty the air and make it difficult to see the stars clearly. Option (B) is unrelated to the question and not relevant to air pollution. Option (C) is unrelated and not related to air pollution. Option (D) is also unrelated and not related to air pollution.

Option (B) is unrelated and refers to a noise-making device. Option (C) is unrelated and refers to a type of food. Option (D) is unrelated and refers to a piece of furniture.
